doc.title: Icon Men: Robert Amstler Chest and Arms
doc.plot: Fitness Super Star Robert Amstler Shares With You His Own Personal and Private Workout Routine! America loved him as the finalist on the hit reality show Cupid. And now this handsome and massive fitness expert teaches you, step by step, while he pushes, lifts, and curls through each exercise - the exercise routine he personally uses to create his own cut, and perfectly defined physique! He demonstrates with his ripped and pumped body, exactly how each muscle group responds to his amazing workout routine. Robert Has a Perfectly Proportioned, Rock Hard Muscled Body.... and Now You Can Too! The DVD is about 40-50 minutes long, gorgeously shot on digital.
